steps.title: Welcome to Texas Hold'em
steps.message: Texas Hold'em is the most popular form of poker today. You'll play against other players, not the house. Everyone gets 2 private cards, and 5 shared cards are placed in the middle.

steps.title: The Setup
steps.message: You’ll be dealt two private cards, face down. Then five community cards will be revealed in stages. You’ll try to make the best 5-card hand using any combination of your 2 cards and the 5 shared ones.

steps.title: How the Game Flows
steps.message: There are four rounds of betting: Preflop, Flop, Turn, and River. After each betting round, more cards are revealed. You can fold, call, or raise during each round.

steps.title: The Winning Hand
steps.message: At the end, if multiple players are left, everyone shows their cards. The best 5-card hand wins the pot. Or — you can win if everyone else folds before showdown!

steps.title: Let’s Continue
steps.message: Great job. You now know the basic structure of Texas Hold'em. Next, let’s look at what makes a strong hand.
